de.tif.jacob.util
Class DatetimeUtil

java.lang.Object
  de.tif.jacob.util.DatetimeUtil

public final class DatetimeUtil
extends java.lang.Object

Class to convert date, time and datetime objects to strings and vice versa.

public static java.sql.Date convertToDate(java.lang.String str)
                                   throws InvalidExpressionException
Converts a string to a date object.

Parameters:
str - the string to convert
Returns:
the date object or null if str is null or an empty string
Throws:
InvalidExpressionException - if str could not be parsed correctly

Returns:
the localized string or null if date is null

convertTimestampToString

public static java.lang.String convertTimestampToString(java.sql.Timestamp timestamp,
                                                        java.util.Locale locale)
Converts a timestamp object to a localized string.

Note: The timestamp object will be converted on second resolution base.

Parameters:
timestamp - the timestamp object
locale - the locale
Returns:
the localized string or null if timestamp is null
Since:
2.7.2
